subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Golden State, the eighth-seeded team in the Western Conference, has a 3-1 lead in the best-of-seven series and can oust the top-seeded Mavericks on Tuesday in Dallas.
snippet: Golden State, the eighth-seeded team in the Western Conference, has a 3-1 lead in the best-of-seven series and can oust the top-seeded Mavericks on Tuesday in Dallas.
